article.title: Welcome to the U.S. Export Assistance Center in Kansas
article.summary: Learn more about the U.S. Export Assistance Center in Kansas.
article.content:
​​​With offices in Wichita, KS and Kansas City, MO, the U.S. Commercial Service of the U.S. Department of Commerce is a federal government agency dedicated to helping small-to-medium sized companies in Kansas to develop international markets.

As the trade promotion arm of the Department of Commerce's International Trade Administration and through our global network of trade professionals located in nearly 80 countries and across the United States, we provide U.S. companies:

  • Market Intelligence to help U.S. exporters target the right market (s) for their products and services
  • Trade Counseling to provide them with the information they need to navigate the export process from beginning to end
  • Business Matchmaking services to connect them with the right partners and prospects
  • Trade Advocacy for U.S companies to level the international playing field for international procurement

With over30 years of experience assisting Kansas exporters, our trade specialists can give you the knowledge and support you need to expand and succeed in getting your product or service into foreign markets. Let the U.S. Commercial Service be your first stop on the road to international success!

Take the first step into finding new markets! Contact your local Trade Specialist who can help increase your export sales.

U.S. Commercial Service Kansas offices:

  • Wichita
  • Kansas City
article.seometadatatitle: Welcome to the U.S. Export Assistance Center in Kansas
article.seometadatadescription: Learn more about the U.S. Export Assistance Centers in Kansas.
